ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Bugenhagen
“After death…
The ghosts of the Gi.
Like stagnant air…”{PAUSE}“This…can't be!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Bugenhagen
“…Thank you, {Cloud}.
because of you, we survived.”{PAUSE}“Nanaki, you have grown strong, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Bugenhagen
“Now I know that it wasn't a mistake
bringing you here…”{PAUSE}“Come, I have something I want to show you.
Right over here.”

ops.raw: d0 89 ff ae fe 7f ff 6d 00 ae fe 7f ff

ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});
